page.title: 08SHOPPING IN CARLTON
page.content: Our block is a{rural}area.There are three{villages,Letwell,Carlton- {in-Lindrick and Wallingwells.There}are no shops in Wallingwells because the village is too small.There used to be a shop in Letwell,but it is now a saddlery.Also there is a{post office but it only sells{stamps.Carlton has 13 local shops,1{supermarket,a {surgery,a chemist,a grocers, a bakers, {a butchers,3 hairdressers,a fruit {shop,a cafe,a fish & chip shop,and {'Whatmough' which is a newsagents.Also in Carlton there is a{Lloyds}bank.If people have transport the most popular shop is{Tesco the supermarket in Worksop. But the old people rely on their local shops or{travelling shops like the fruit and vegetable van. I don't think there are many shops for the size of{Carlton.
